acceptOwnership().details: Allows the newOwner address to finalize the transfer.

getResourceByAuthor(address).details: Query all resources the author has published.

returns._0: bool     : The successful call returns true.
bool     : The successful call returns true.

isBought(address,bytes16).details: Query whether a particular user has purchased a resource

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.

transferAdminship(address).details: Allows the current admin to transfer control of the contract to a newadmin.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params._newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.

userdoc.notice: Whitelist permission is required for data writing
